thread.title: Retailers Are Caught in Political Fights Over Trump
thread.title_full: Retailers Are Caught in Political Fights Over Trump - WSJ

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Retailers Are Caught in Political Fights Over Trump

organizations.name: white house defends trump tweet against nordstrom white house press

text:
Retailers and big brands are increasingly getting pulled into partisan fights involving President Donald Trump, as a deeply divided nation seeks to punish those that don’t agree with their political views.

The debates, which kicked off the day after the November election with a fight over sneaker maker New Balance Athletics Inc.’s support of Mr. Trump’s trade policy, have been sustained by social media and Facebook groups in the... RELATED VIDEO White House Defends Trump Tweet Against Nordstrom White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer defended a tweet by President Trump admonishing Nordstrom over its decision to drop his daughter Ivanka's fashion label, saying Trump 'has every right' to defend his family. Photo: Getty
